data.title: Acting and Filmmaking Classes
data.meta_description: Join one of our Acting and/or Filmmaking Classes for Ages 11-14! Learn On-Camera Acting or make your very own short film!
data.text:
At Spotlight, we offer both Acting and Filmmaking Classes for Agest 11-14. You can join a class at any time! â€¦As long as the class is not on a waiting list. If you are joining a class after the first of the month, please reach out to us if you would like to have the class prorated before enrollment. Otherwise, a credit will be applied to your account for the next month. If the class is on a waiting list, please add yourself to our waiting list and we will contact you as soon as there is a space available for you.

We offer a Master Class Acting Class for Ages 11-14. Please enroll in the open enrollment class and an instructor will invite you to join the Master class as soon as they feel you are ready.
